trans-unit.source: Hosts a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"></xref> control in a cell of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"></xref> for editing strings.
trans-unit.target: Verter en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"> </xref> kontrollen i en celle i en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"> </xref> for redigering strenger.

trans-unit.source: The DataGridTextBoxColumn class derives from the `abstract` class <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>.
trans-unit.target: Klassen DataGridTextBoxColumn er avledet fra den `abstract` klassen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>

trans-unit.source: At run time, the DataGridTextBoxColumn hosts a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBox> control that allows users to edit text.
trans-unit.target: På kjøretid DataGridTextBoxColumn verter en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBox>kontroll som kan brukes til å redigere tekst.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBox>

trans-unit.source: Special properties added to the class include <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Format%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.HideEditBox%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Spesielle egenskaper som er lagt til klassen som inkluderer <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Format%2A>, og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.HideEditBox%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.HideEditBox%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Format%2A>

trans-unit.source: These properties allow you to access the hosted <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBox> control and its attributes, and set the format for displaying values.
trans-unit.target: Disse egenskapene får du tilgang til det vertsbaserte <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBox>kontrollen og attributter, og angi formatet for å vise verdier.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBox>

trans-unit.source: If the data source is a <xref:System.Data.DataTable> containing <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> objects, the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.DataType%2A> property of the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> should be set to a data type that can logically be edited in a text box control.
trans-unit.target: Hvis datakilden er en <xref:System.Data.DataTable>som inneholder <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>objekter i <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.DataType%2A>-egenskapen for den <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>må være satt til en datatype som logisk kan redigeres i en tekstbokskontroll.</xref:System.Data.DataColumn> </xref:System.Data.DataColumn.DataType%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataColumn> </xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: The following data types are automatically associated with a DataGridTextBoxColumn : <xref:System.Byte>, <xref:System.DateTime>, <xref:System.Decimal>, <xref:System.Double>, <xref:System.Int16>, <xref:System.Int32>, <xref:System.Int64>, <xref:System.UInt16>, <xref:System.UInt32>, <xref:System.UInt64>, <xref:System.Single>, and <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: Følgende datatyper tilknyttes automatisk en DataGridTextBoxColumn: <xref:System.Byte>, <xref:System.DateTime>, <xref:System.Decimal>, <xref:System.Double>, <xref:System.Int16>, <xref:System.Int32>, <xref:System.Int64>, <xref:System.UInt16>, <xref:System.UInt32>, <xref:System.UInt64>, <xref:System.Single>, og <xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String> </xref:System.Single> </xref:System.UInt64> </xref:System.UInt32> </xref:System.UInt16> </xref:System.Int64> </xref:System.Int32> </xref:System.Int16> </xref:System.Double> </xref:System.Decimal> </xref:System.DateTime> </xref:System.Byte>

trans-unit.source: [Visual Basic] > [!NOTE] > The following types are not fully supported by Visual Basic: <xref:System.DateTime>, <xref:System.UInt16>, <xref:System.UInt32>, <xref:System.UInt64>, and <xref:System.TimeSpan>.
trans-unit.target: [Visual Basic] > [!NOTE] > følgende typer har ikke full støtte Visual Basic: <xref:System.DateTime>, <xref:System.UInt16>, <xref:System.UInt32>, <xref:System.UInt64>, og <xref:System.TimeSpan>.</xref:System.TimeSpan> </xref:System.UInt64> </xref:System.UInt32> </xref:System.UInt16> </xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: (Operators are not allowed.)
trans-unit.target: (Operatorer er ikke tillatt.)

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn"></xref> with a specified <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn"> </xref> med et angitt <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> uses a <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> to determine the type of data displayed in the column.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>bruker en <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>å finne ut hvilken type dataene som vises i kolonnen.</xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>

trans-unit.source: To return a <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.GetItemProperties%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> class.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection>ved å bruke <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.GetItemProperties%2A>metoden for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>klasse.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.GetItemProperties%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> for the column with which the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn"></xref> will be associated.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref> for kolonnen som de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn"> </xref> skal knyttes til.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn"></xref> class using the specified <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn"> </xref> klasse parametersettet med de angitte <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn"></xref> is a default column.
trans-unit.target: Angir om den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn"> </xref> er en standardkolonne.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> uses a <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> to determine the type of data displayed in the column.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>bruker en <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>å finne ut hvilken type dataene som vises i kolonnen.</xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>

trans-unit.source: To return a <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.GetItemProperties%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> class.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection>ved å bruke <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.GetItemProperties%2A>metoden for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>klasse.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.GetItemProperties%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> to be associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref> kan tilordnes til det <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn"></xref> is a default column.
trans-unit.target: Angir om den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn"> </xref> er en standardkolonne.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn"></xref> with the specified <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> and format.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn"> </xref> med angitt <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref> og -format.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create a custom format for the displayed data.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne konstruktøren til å opprette en egendefinert format for dataene som vises.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> uses a <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> to determine the type of data displayed in the column.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>bruker en <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>å finne ut hvilken type dataene som vises i kolonnen.</xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>

trans-unit.source: To return a <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.GetItemProperties%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> class.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection>ved å bruke <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.GetItemProperties%2A>metoden for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>klasse.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.GetItemProperties%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection>

trans-unit.source: For more information about formatting characters, see [Formatting Types](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om formatering tegn, kan du se [formateringstyper](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) og [egendefinert dato og klokkeslett-formatstrenger](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> for the column with which the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn"></xref> will be associated.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref> for kolonnen som de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn"> </xref> skal knyttes til.

trans-unit.source: The format used to format the column values.
trans-unit.target: Formatet som brukes til å formatere kolonneverdiene.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn"></xref> class with a specified <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> and format.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn"> </xref> klassen med et angitt <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref> og -format.

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether the column is the default column.
trans-unit.target: Angir om kolonnen er standardkolonnen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> uses a <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> to determine the type of data displayed in the column.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>bruker en <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>å finne ut hvilken type dataene som vises i kolonnen.</xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>

trans-unit.source: To return a <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.GetItemProperties%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> class.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection>ved å bruke <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.GetItemProperties%2A>metoden for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>klasse.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.GetItemProperties%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> to be associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref> kan tilordnes til det <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The format used.
trans-unit.target: Formatet som brukes.

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn"></xref> is the default column.
trans-unit.target: Angir om den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn"> </xref> er standardkolonnen.

trans-unit.source: Initiates a request to interrupt an edit procedure.
trans-unit.target: Starter en forespørsel om å avbryte en Rediger-prosedyre.

trans-unit.source: This method rolls back any change made to the column and invokes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.HideEditBox%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.EndEdit%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden ruller tilbake eventuelle endringer i kolonnen og aktiverer det <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.HideEditBox%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.EndEdit%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.EndEdit%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.HideEditBox%2A>

trans-unit.source: The number of the row in which an edit operation is being interrupted.
trans-unit.target: Antall raden som en redigeringsoperasjonen blir avbrutt.

trans-unit.source: Inititates a request to complete an editing procedure.
trans-unit.target: Inititates en forespørsel om å fullføre en redigering prosedyre.

trans-unit.source: The method checks to ensure that an edit is indeed occurring.
trans-unit.target: Metoden kontrollerer for å sikre at en Rediger faktisk oppstod.

trans-unit.source: If so, it formats the value appropriately.
trans-unit.target: Da det formaterer verdien på riktig måte.

trans-unit.source: If the value is `null`, the method enters <xref:System.Convert.DBNull> into the column; otherwise, it uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.SetColumnValueAtRow%2A> method to commit the value.
trans-unit.target: Hvis verdien er `null`, metoden angir <xref:System.Convert.DBNull>i kolonnen; hvis ikke, den bruker den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.SetColumnValueAtRow%2A>metode for å lagre verdien.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.SetColumnValueAtRow%2A> </xref:System.Convert.DBNull>

trans-unit.source: The method is called by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> when an editing operation is committed.
trans-unit.target: Metoden kalles av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>når en redigering operasjonen er utført.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"></xref> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref> control the column belongs to.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"> </xref> av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"> </xref> kontrollen kolonnen tilhører.

trans-unit.source: The number of the edited row.
trans-unit.target: Antall redigerte raden.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the value was successfully committed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis verdien er ble lagret; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Informs the column that the focus is being conceded.
trans-unit.target: Informerer kolonnen som er i fokus conceded.

trans-unit.source: In this overridden method, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control hosted by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn> is hidden.
trans-unit.target: I denne overstyrte metoden den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>kontrollen vert i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn>er skjult.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: Prepares a cell for editing.
trans-unit.target: Klargjør en celle for redigering.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Edit%2A> sites a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control on the grid at the location of the cell being edited.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Edit%2A>områder en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>kontrollen i rutenettet på plasseringen i cellen som redigeres.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Edit%2A>

trans-unit.source: The method is called by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> class's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BeginEdit%2A> method when an editing operation is about to begin.
trans-unit.target: Metoden kalles av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>klassens <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BeginEdit%2A>metoden når en redigeringsoperasjonen skal starte.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BeginEdit%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"></xref> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref> control the column belongs to.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"> </xref> av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"> </xref> kontrollen kolonnen tilhører.

trans-unit.source: The row number in this column being edited.
trans-unit.target: Radnummeret i denne kolonnen som redigeres.

trans-unit.source: The bounding <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> in which the control is to be sited.
trans-unit.target: Markeringsramme <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> som kontrollen er bli vist.

trans-unit.source: A value indicating whether the column is a read-only.
trans-unit.target: En verdi som angir om kolonnen er en skrivebeskyttet.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the value is read-only; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis verdien er skrivebeskyttet. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The text to display in the control.
trans-unit.target: Teksten som skal vises i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: A value indicating whether the cell is visible.
trans-unit.target: En verdi som angir om cellen er synlig.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the cell is visible; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis cellen er synlige. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Ends an edit operation on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Slutter en redigeringsoperasjon på den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To edit the value of a cell, call the <xref:System.Data.DataRow> object's <xref:System.Data.DataRow.BeginEdit%2A> before changing the value.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil redigere verdien til en celle, kan du kalle den <xref:System.Data.DataRow>objektets <xref:System.Data.DataRow.BeginEdit%2A>før du endrer verdien.</xref:System.Data.DataRow.BeginEdit%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataRow>

trans-unit.source: You must invoke the <xref:System.Data.DataRow.AcceptChanges%2A> method on both the <xref:System.Data.DataRow> and <xref:System.Data.DataTable> objects before the change is committed.
trans-unit.target: Du må aktivere den <xref:System.Data.DataRow.AcceptChanges%2A>-metoden på både den <xref:System.Data.DataRow>og <xref:System.Data.DataTable>objekter før endringen er utført.</xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataRow> </xref:System.Data.DataRow.AcceptChanges%2A>

trans-unit.source: Enters a <xref href="System.DBNull.Value"></xref> in the column.
trans-unit.target: Angir en <xref href="System.DBNull.Value"> </xref> i kolonnen.

trans-unit.source: Enters the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.NullText%2A> value into the cell.
trans-unit.target: Angir den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.NullText%2A>verdien i cellen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.NullText%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the character(s) that specify how text is formatted.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir tegn som angir hvordan teksten er formatert.

trans-unit.source: The Format property specifies how values are displayed in the column.
trans-unit.target: Angir hvordan verdier vises i kolonnen.

trans-unit.source: For example, set the property to "c" to specify that the values will be formatted as the local currency.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel ikke angi egenskapen til "c" til å angi at verdiene formateres som lokal valuta.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> for the computer is used to determine the actual currency format.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>for datamaskinen brukes til å bestemme det faktiske valutaformatet.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: The values are automatically unformatted to the native type when data is changed.
trans-unit.target: Verdiene er formatert automatisk til den opprinnelige typen når data endres.

trans-unit.source: For more information about formatting characters, see [Formatting Types](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om formatering tegn, kan du se [formateringstyper](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) og [egendefinert dato og klokkeslett-formatstrenger](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The format you apply should be appropriate to the data type.
trans-unit.target: Formatet du angir må være passende å datatypen.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the data is numeric in nature use one of the numeric format strings.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel hvis dataene er numeriske i ettersom bruke en av strenger for tallformat.

trans-unit.source: You can change the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn> by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.FormatInfo%2A> property to a new <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> instance constructed with an appropriate culture ID.
trans-unit.target: Du kan endre den <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>for en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn>ved å sette <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.FormatInfo%2A>egenskapen til en ny <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>forekomst konstruert med en passende Kultur ID.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.FormatInfo%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn> </xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: To set the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> for the application, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.CurrentCulture%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application> object to a new <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> instance constructed with an appropriate culture ID.
trans-unit.target: Angi <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>for programmet, kan du angi <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.CurrentCulture%2A>for- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application>objekt til en ny <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>forekomst konstruert med en passende Kultur ID.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.CurrentCulture%2A> </xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: The character or characters that specify how text is formatted.
trans-unit.target: Eller de tegnene som angir hvordan teksten er formatert.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the culture specific information used to determine how values are formatted.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir kulturen informasjonen brukes til å bestemme hvordan verdiene er formatert.

trans-unit.source: When setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Format%2A> property to one of the formatting characters, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn> uses the information provided by the FormatInfo property to further specify what cultural-specific formatting to use.
trans-unit.target: Ved angivelse av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Format%2A>til en av formatere tegn i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn>bruker informasjonen som er angitt av egenskapen FormatInfo angi hvilken kulturelle-formatering for å bruke.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Format%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Format%2A> property is set to the format character "c" (for currency), you can further specify that the symbol for the lira be used.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Format%2A>er satt til format tegnet "c" (for valuta), kan du også angi symbol for lira brukes.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Format%2A>

trans-unit.source: To do this, create a new <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object with the locale ID for Italy, and set the FormatInfo property to the new <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil gjøre dette, kan du opprette en ny <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>objekt med IDen for nasjonal innstilling for Italia, og angi FormatInfo-egenskapen til den nye <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>objektet.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> </xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: For more information about formatting characters, see [Formatting Types](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om formatering tegn, kan du se [formateringstyper](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) og [egendefinert dato og klokkeslett-formatstrenger](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: An object that implements the <xref:System.IFormatProvider> interface, such as the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> class.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som implementerer <xref:System.IFormatProvider>grensesnittet, for eksempel <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>klasse.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> </xref:System.IFormatProvider>

trans-unit.source: Gets the height of a cell in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter høyden på en celle i en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value returned by GetMinimumHeight is calculated by adding the size of the column's font plus a margin value.
trans-unit.target: Verdien som returneres av GetMinimumHeight beregnes ved å legge til størrelsen på den kolonnen skrift og en margverdi.

trans-unit.source: The height of a cell.
trans-unit.target: Høyden på en celle.

trans-unit.source: Gets the height to be used in for automatically resizing columns.
trans-unit.target: Henter høyden som skal brukes i for automatisk endring av kolonner.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object used to draw shapes on the screen.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> objektet som ble brukt til å tegne former på skjermen.

trans-unit.source: The value to draw.
trans-unit.target: Verdien til å tegne.

trans-unit.source: The height the cells automatically resize to.
trans-unit.target: Høyden cellene skaleres automatisk til.

trans-unit.source: Returns the optimum width and height of the cell in a specified row relative to the specified value.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer optimalt bredden og høyden på cellen i en bestemt rad i forhold til den angitte verdien.

trans-unit.source: The optimum width and height is calculated by measuring the string size, taking into account its font and attributes, and adding margin values.
trans-unit.target: Optimalt bredden og høyden beregnes ved måle størrelsen på målstrengen tar hensyn skrift og attributter og legge til marg verdier.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object used to draw shapes on the screen.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> objektet som ble brukt til å tegne former på skjermen.

trans-unit.source: The value to draw.
trans-unit.target: Verdien til å tegne.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> that contains the dimensions of the cell.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> som inneholder dimensjoner i cellen.

trans-unit.source: Hides the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBox"></xref> control and moves the focus to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Skjuler den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBox"> </xref> kontrollere og flytter fokus til den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Paints the a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"></xref> with the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>, <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"></xref>, and row number.
trans-unit.target: Maler i en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"> </xref> med angitt <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>, <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"> </xref>, og radnummer.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object to draw to.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> -objektet til å tegne til.

trans-unit.source: The bounding <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> to paint into.
trans-unit.target: Markeringsramme <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> til fargemerknader i.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"></xref> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref> the that contains the column.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"> </xref> av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"> </xref> som inneholder kolonnen.

trans-unit.source: The number of the row in the underlying data table.
trans-unit.target: Antall raden i datatabellen underliggende.

trans-unit.source: Paints a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"></xref> with the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>, <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"></xref>, row number, and alignment.
trans-unit.target: Maler en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"> </xref> med angitt <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>, <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"> </xref>, radnummeret og justering.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Paint%2A> method uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.GetColumnValueAtRow%2A> to determine the value to draw in the cell.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Paint%2A>metoden bruker den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.GetColumnValueAtRow%2A>å bestemme verdien til å tegne i cellen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.GetColumnValueAtRow%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Paint%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.PaintText%2A> method is called to draw the cell and its contents.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.PaintText%2A>metoden kalles for å tegne cellen og innholdet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.PaintText%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object to draw to.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> -objektet til å tegne til.

trans-unit.source: The bounding <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> to paint into.
trans-unit.target: Markeringsramme <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> til fargemerknader i.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"></xref> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref> the that contains the column.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"> </xref> av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"> </xref> som inneholder kolonnen.

trans-unit.source: The number of the row in the underlying data table.
trans-unit.target: Antall raden i datatabellen underliggende.

trans-unit.source: A value indicating whether to align the column's content to the right.
trans-unit.target: En verdi som angir om Juster kolonnens innhold til høyre.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the content should be aligned to the right; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis innholdet skal justeres til høyre. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Paints a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"></xref> with the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>, <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"></xref>, row number, <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref>, and foreground color.
trans-unit.target: Maler en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"> </xref> med angitt <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>, <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"> </xref>, radnummer, <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"> </xref>, og forgrunnsfarge.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Paint%2A> method uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.GetColumnValueAtRow%2A> to determine the value to draw in the cell.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Paint%2A>metoden bruker den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.GetColumnValueAtRow%2A>å bestemme verdien til å tegne i cellen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.GetColumnValueAtRow%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Paint%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.PaintText%2A> method is called to draw the cell and its contents.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.PaintText%2A>metoden kalles for å tegne cellen og innholdet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.PaintText%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object to draw to.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> -objektet til å tegne til.

trans-unit.source: The bounding <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> to paint into.
trans-unit.target: Markeringsramme <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> til fargemerknader i.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"></xref> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref> the that contains the column.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"> </xref> av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"> </xref> som inneholder kolonnen.

trans-unit.source: The number of the row in the underlying data table.
trans-unit.target: Antall raden i datatabellen underliggende.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref> that paints the background.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"> </xref> som maler bakgrunnen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref> that paints the foreground color.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"> </xref> som maler forgrunnsfarge.

trans-unit.source: A value indicating whether to align the column's content to the right.
trans-unit.target: En verdi som angir om Juster kolonnens innhold til høyre.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the content should be aligned to the right; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis innholdet skal justeres til høyre. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Draws the text and rectangle at the given location with the specified alignment.
trans-unit.target: Tegner tekst og rektangel i den angitte plasseringen med den angitte justeringen.

trans-unit.source: The PaintText method uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Format> object set with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Format%2A> property to format the value before drawing it to the screen.
trans-unit.target: Metoden PaintText bruker den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Format>objektet som er angitt med den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Format%2A>til å formatere verdien før tegning til skjermen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Format%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Format>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Paint%2A> method calls the PaintText method.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Paint%2A>metodekall metoden PaintText.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Paint%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object used to draw the string.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> objektet brukes til å tegne strengen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> which contains the boundary data of the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> som inneholder dataene grense for rektanglet.

trans-unit.source: The string to be drawn to the screen.
trans-unit.target: Strengen som skal tegnes på skjermen.

trans-unit.source: A value indicating whether the text is right-aligned.
trans-unit.target: En verdi som angir om teksten er høyrejustert.

trans-unit.source: Draws the text and rectangle at the specified location with the specified colors and alignment.
trans-unit.target: Tegner tekst og rektangel i den angitte plasseringen med den angitte farger og justering.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.PaintText%2A> method uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Format%2A> property to format the value before drawing it to the screen.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.PaintText%2A>metoden bruker den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Format%2A>til å formatere verdien før tegning til skjermen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Format%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.PaintText%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Paint%2A> method calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.PaintText%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Paint%2A>metodekall den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.PaintText%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.PaintText%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Paint%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object used to draw the string.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> objektet brukes til å tegne strengen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> which contains the boundary data of the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> som inneholder dataene grense for rektanglet.

trans-unit.source: The string to be drawn to the screen.
trans-unit.target: Strengen som skal tegnes på skjermen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref> that determines the rectangle's background color
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"> </xref> som bestemmer bakgrunnsfargen for den rektangel

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref> that determines the rectangles foreground color.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"> </xref> som bestemmer fargen som rektangler forgrunnen.

trans-unit.source: A value indicating whether the text is right-aligned.
trans-unit.target: En verdi som angir om teksten er høyrejustert.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref> for den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> that formats the values displayed in the column.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref> som formaterer verdiene som vises i kolonnen.

trans-unit.source: Sets a value indicating whether the text box column is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Angir en verdi som angir om teksten for kolonnen er skrivebeskyttet.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the text box column is read-only; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis teksten for kolonnen er skrivebeskyttet. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Removes the reference that the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref> holds to the control used to edit data.
trans-unit.target: Fjerner referansen som den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"> </xref> inneholder styre brukes til å redigere data.

trans-unit.source: This method removes the reference that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> holds to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBox> control, in order to free system resources.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden fjerner referansen som den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>inneholder den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBox>kontroll, for å frigjøre systemressurser.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: Adds a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"></xref> control to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref> control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Legger til en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"> </xref> styre til den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"> </xref> kontrollens <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>

trans-unit.source: When this methods is called, the hosted <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control is added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Når denne metoder kalles, den vertsbaserte <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>kontrollen er lagt til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>kontrollens <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: This allows the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> to associate both controls with the same data source.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør det <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>å knytte begge kontrollene til samme datakilde.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref> control the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"></xref> control is added to.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"> </xref> kontroll av <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"> </xref> kontrollen er lagt til.

trans-unit.source: Gets the hosted <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter den vertsbaserte <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"></xref> control hosted by the column.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"> </xref> kontroll som er lagret i kolonnen.

trans-unit.source: Updates the user interface.
trans-unit.target: Oppdaterer brukergrensesnittet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"></xref> that supplies the data.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"> </xref> som leverer dataene.

trans-unit.source: The index of the row to update.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen i raden å oppdatere.

trans-unit.source: The text that will be displayed in the cell.
trans-unit.target: Teksten som skal vises i cellen.
